column1: #Text=Mako says : " Asami , I think I know who set us up . "
#Text=Mako says : " What are you doing here ? "
#Text=Asami says : " He just saved my company .
#Text=Especially if that little guy can help this guy become a bigger guy .
#Text=" Asami says : " So what were you saying , Mako ?
#Text=You think you know who hired the Triple Threats ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah , and I 'm real close to proving it .
